text: She's Emmy - nominated again for her acting skills on Black - ish. But Tracee Ellis Ross decided to show off her innate style skills as she dressed to impress at the Glamour x Tory Burch event in Los Angeles on Sunday. The 45 - year - old beauty took a casual spin on her flawless fashion sense as she rocked a white billowing top and striped skirt for the star - studded soiree.
